channel.title: Shinogobmi
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Shinogobmi" - The village hidden in death

item.title: Shinogobmi
item.content:encoded:
I'm Nurute, the Kage of Shinogobmi

All ninja looking for a village are free to join.
We already have a lot of upgrades, including:

  1. Hitaiate Maker
  2. Party House
  3. Banker
  4. Collection Squad
  5. Spy Towers
  6. Sentry Squads
  7. Genin Training School
  8. Chunin Training School
  9. War Council
  10. Jonin Council
  11. Black Market
  12. Natural Research Facility
  13. Tasty Ramen Shop
  14. Connections

I haven't listed them all (Hey, we're in a state of war =p) since that's safer ; )
If you're interested, feel free to join and for questions you're free to pm me (^-^)
